title: Intern
description: As an Intern at GoTo, I worked on the Grasshopper desktop application by being a big part in implementing the new contacts feature and the application re-design.

media.description: A screenshot of the UI implementation for contacts feature of grasshopper desktop application.
An example of the contacts feature. Adding, editing, interactions with a contact object.
A screenshot of the partial redesign of grasshopper desktop application.
A demonstration of the new design with additional features.
